unit_rules.name: Primarch of the First Legion
unit_rules.text:
At the start of the Battle Round, select one effect to be active until the end of the Battle Round:
* Melee attacks made by friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ +Infantry+ units within 6" have +1 to the hit roll.
* Friendly +Adeptus Astartes+ units within 6" have !Feel No Pain 4+! against mortal damage.
* When your opponent targets their unit within 12" with a Strategem, gain 1 CP and the targeted unit must take a Battle-Shock test before resolving the Strategem. If failed, the unit is Battle-Shocked and the Strategem has no effect.

unit_rules.name: Dark Angels Bodyguard
unit_rules.text: While within 3" of a friendly +Adeptus Astartes Infantry+ unit, this model has +Lone Operative+.
